short_description: This function converts the binary weight vector into sparse (attributeid,weight) pairs.
long_description: This function read a SVM model from model table, then convert  the model to sparse format according with the attribute and class label. If hash projection is adopted in training the model, it will find the  attribute string from the original input table.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.description: It should be the training dataset, otherwise the result may be incomplete.

input_tables.name: model
input_tables.description: The model table generated by SparseSVMTrainer.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeColumn
argument_clauses.description: The column contains the attribute names in inputtable. Input columns must contain integer SQL types. Input columns must contain string SQL types.

argument_clauses.name: Summary
argument_clauses.description: If true, the output should be the summary information of the model. Otherwise, the output will be the detail weight of each attribute in the model. The default value is false.
